List of all members.

Properties

CPLineStyle * borderLineStyle
 The line style for the layer border. If nil, the border is not drawn.
CGFloat cornerRadius
 Radius for the rounded corners of the layer.
CPFill * fill
 The fill for the layer background. If nil, the layer background is not filled.
BOOL masksToBorder
 If YES (the default), a sublayer mask is applied to clip sublayer content to the inside of the border.

Detailed Description

A layer with rounded corners.
